thread.title: ScHoolboy Q Reflects On "Habits & Contradictions" For Its 5th Anniversary
thread.title_full: ScHoolboy Q Reflects On "Habits & Contradictions" For Its 5th Anniversary

author: Trevor Smith
title: ScHoolboy Q Reflects On "Habits & Contradictions" For Its 5th Anniversary
text:
Home > News > ScHoolboy Q Reflects On "Habits & Contradictions" For Its 5th Anniversary ScHoolboy Q Reflects On "Habits & Contradictions" For Its 5th Anniversary 0 0   06:00pm ScHoolboy Q's second full length for TDE came out five years ago today. 
ScHoolboy Q 's Habits & Contradictions , in many ways his breakthrough project, celebrates its 5th anniversary today (January 14th), and Q decided to share some thoughts on the project on Instagram. 
"5 years ago today #HnC ," he wrote, recalling the very different circumstances he was in at the time. "niggaHz wasn't callin my pHone tHen, tHey waited til da platinum plaques and Grammy noms came leecHes r losers tHank u groovy Q fans. A photo posted by ScHoolboy Q (@groovyq) on Jan 14, 2017 at 1:29pm PST 
The project featured guest appearances from TDE members Kendrick Lamar and Ab-Soul , as well as memorable collaborations with ASAP Rocky and Jhene Aiko . As of 2014, it had sold 48,00 copies in the U.S. Last year, Q released his 4th album, and second for a major label, Black Face LP   06:00pm 0 Views 
Future hopes to see the Falcons win, and Russell Wilson lose. ScHoolboy Q's second full length for TDE came out five years ago today. 
ScHoolboy Q 's Habits & Contradictions , in many ways his breakthrough project, celebrates its 5th anniversary today (January 14th), and Q decided to share some thoughts on the project on Instagram. 
"5 years ago today #HnC ," he wrote, recalling the very different circumstances he was in at the time. "niggaHz wasn't callin my pHone tHen, tHey waited til da platinum plaques and Grammy noms came leecHes r losers tHank u groovy Q fans. A photo posted by ScHoolboy Q (@groovyq) on Jan 14, 2017 at 1:29pm PST 
The project featured guest appearances from TDE members Kendrick Lamar and Ab-Soul , as well as memorable collaborations with ASAP Rocky and Jhene Aiko . As of 2014, it had sold 48,00 copies in the U.S. Last year, Q released his 4th album, and second for a major label, Black Face LP .
